Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Excessive vibration in control linkage. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Component fatigue due to operational stress cycles exceeding design limits
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Door Mechanism component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Modify design to incorporate additional safety margin
d) Attributable Code: NFF - No Failure Found
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
Date: 19/05/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel
